text: Modern Family is an American sitcom on ABC. It is about three different families who are all connected as one extended family. It was nominated for 4 Golden Globe Awards. It was created by Christopher Lloyd and Steven Levitan. == Cast == The show stars Ed O'Neill, Sof√≠a Vergara, Jesse Tyler Ferguson, Eric Stonestreet, Julie Bowen, Ty Burrell, Sarah Hyland, Nolan Gould, Ariel Winter, Rico Rodriguez and Aubrey Anderson-Emmons. == Story == There are three different nuclear families, who are all part of one well-off, middle-class extended family. They all live in suburban Los Angeles. Jay is the father of Claire and Mitchell and his second wife Gloria has a son from her first marriage called Manny, and a son with Jay called Joe. Claire and her husband Phil have three children, Haley, Alex and Luke. Mitchell and his husband Cameron have a daughter called Lily, whom they adopted from Vietnam. == Other websites == * Category:2009 American television series debuts Category:2020 American television series endings Category:2000s American sitcoms Category:2000s LGBT television series Category:2010s American sitcoms Category:2010s LGBT television series Category:American LGBT television programs Category:Emmy Award winning programs Category:Fiction about suburbia Category:Golden Globe Award winning programs Category:LGBT comedy television series Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners Category:Television series about marriage Category:Television series about siblings Category:Television series about suburbia Category:Television series set in Los Angeles Category:English-language television programs
title: Modern Family
